text: Rapid Fire is a 1992 American action movie directed by Dwight H. Little and starring Brandon Lee, Powers Boothe, Nick Mancuso. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * Category:1992 action movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Dwight H. Little
title: Rapid Fire (1992 movie)
